title: New: The XX – Angels
body:
So it’s been three years since **The XX** unleashed their debut album, a record that gradually built a reputation for being one of the finest in recent years.

_Angels_ is the first taster from their sophomore record **Coexist** released 10 September, and it’s a decidedly minimal affair, relying upon the delicate vocals and sparse muted beats. It’s almost a ballad, yet has the sinister, drug induced undertones that we’ve grown to love from the group. It’s great to have them back.
